instruction: Please analyze the risk and return implications of applying only the index-specific exclusionary screens (step 1) and then the risk-return characteristics of the combined methodology (step 1 + step 2) for the ESG indexes from May 31, 2013 to Dec. 31, 2018.
output: Sure, I can analyze the risk and return implications of applying only the exclusionary screens in step 1 and then combining the methodology in step 1 + step 2 for the ESG indexes during the period of May 31, 2013 to Dec. 31, 2018. This will allow us to see the investment impacts of each step separately and how they perform when combined.
